eLabel.text: Uyelik Aktif Olmasini Istiyorsaniz Bilgileri Dogru Girmelisiniz

widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (6, 3), size = (433, 33), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 1), # index 1 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (453, 3), size = (146, 33), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 2), # index 2 is the state MultiContentEntryProgress(pos = (613, 6), size = (146, 20), percent = -3), # index 3 should be progress MultiContentEntryText(pos = (773, 3), size = (53, 33), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_RIGHT, text = 4), # index 4 is the percentage ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular",18),gFont("Regular",18)], "itemHeight": 33 }
